function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Staff working across different care homes have a higher risk of SARS-CoV-2 positivity.","Impact":"Increased transmission of SARS-CoV-2 among staff and potentially to residents.","Mitigation":"Encourage staff to work in single care homes and limit movement of staff across multiple care homes.","Technologies":"Incentives for staff, scheduling software to limit staff movement.","People":"Staff working across different care homes, residents in care homes.","Owner":"Care home management, healthcare authorities."},{"Description":"Distinct clusters of SARS-CoV-2 infection identified between staff with minimal resident contact.","Impact":"Potential spread of infection within care homes despite minimal resident contact.","Mitigation":"Extend infection control measures to all contacts, including those between staff while on the care home premises.","Technologies":"Enhanced sanitation protocols, PPE for all interactions.","People":"Staff, residents in care homes.","Owner":"Care home management, healthcare authorities."}]}
